description: two prints, taped together horizontally at back; top print: open scrapbook overlaid and surrounded by red fleshy lumps, bones and animal parts; bottom print: photograph of collaged fashion photographs, pictures of women, ticket stubs and text; two acorn top glued into image along L edge
marks:
Signature, inscription and mark
Bottom of top ima signed twice, embedded into inscriptions
title: 1994 Tokyo Show
